desc: Stormor is a leading supplier of shelving, racking and storage. We specialise in Lonspan Shelving and Racking, Heavy Duty Rivet Shelving, Garage and Warehouse Shelving, Plastic Storage Containers, Tool Storage, Office and Commercial fit outs, Pallet Racking and Van Racking. Buy online or get a free quote.

layout.text: Ideal for Warehouse, Garage, Retail and Office
